82964545-57b9-4756-bafa-88f61e766529.name: Datastore Total Disk Space for Cluster
82964545-57b9-4756-bafa-88f61e766529.formula: sum(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=Datastore, metric=diskspace|capacity, depth=3, where=(${metric=config|name} contains 'vcf-ops' )})
82964545-57b9-4756-bafa-88f61e766529.description: Datastore Total Disk Space for Cluster
